homePage.hero_subtitle: Your compassionate companion for navigating life's challenges. We offer friendly advice, inspiring stories, and a space to reflect.
homePage.what_aatmAI_can_do: What AatmAI Can Do For You
homePage.feature_1: Offer a friendly ear and a space to share your thoughts.
homePage.feature_2: Provide AI-driven insights for career, financial, and relationship concerns.
homePage.feature_3: Share inspiring real-life stories tailored to your situation.
homePage.feature_4: Help you reflect and find motivation with daily quotes.
homePage.feature_5: Respect your privacy: Your interactions are anonymous and no personal data is stored.
homePage.mood_tracker_description: Sharing your mood can help you understand yourself better.
homePage.friendly_chat_card_description: Receive AI-driven advice tailored to your career, financial, and relationship concerns, with cultural sensitivity for Indian users.
homePage.curated_stories_card_description: Discover inspiring real-life stories curated by AI to match your profile and challenges, offering motivation and new perspectives.
